name: U-Start Business Incubator
overview:
U-Start is a business incubator near Union College. Their mission is to support and encourage promising entrepreneurs to grow their ideas in Schenectady County.

U-Start offers rental space at competitive rates, â€œdrop inâ€ offices, meeting rooms, Internet access, shared administrative services and equipment, and a mentor network of business and technical advisors that provide strategic counsel to help you create a viable business. U-Start forms a dedicated Board of Advisors for your company based on your specific needs.
